fcb_fab_flexible_title: Top Quality 1 to 10 Layer Flexible PCB Manufacturing and Assembly
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_zero: PCBONLINE flexible PCBs or FPCs use thin, flexible dielectric materials between layers of copper with a minimum thickness of 50μm, typically 75% lighter than a similarly sized rigid PCB. Using these materials allows for the circuit to fold, flex, and twist, as well as overall, reduce the size and weights of electronic designs.
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_one: PCBONLINE manufactures and assembles 1 to 10 layer FPC, clear flexible PCB, FPC adding stiffeners, flexible aluminum PCB, FPC with carbon ink plated, FPC electroplated by gold, and so on. The applications are consumer electronics, medical, automotive, aerospace, defense, etc.
fcb_fab_flexible_advantages_bottom_word_: • Ideal in locations where space and weight are a concern.
• Increased reliability of interconnects within an electronic module or assembly because FPCs are used instead of wires and connectors.
• Extremely cost effective when a high number of connections are needed between two points.
• A high quality, space saving solution for every industry!

fcb_fab_flexible_manufacturing_tech_gerb: PCBONLINE is able to meet the following technical capabilities for all of our flexible designs:
fcb_fab_flexible_manufacturing_tech_term: If you need to utilize FPC designs for your application, then you should first familiarize yourself with the common terminology that is used. A few common terms for the flexible PCB industry are found below:
FPC materials can be damaged or broken due to repeated or excess bending and flexing actions of the substrate. This type of failure is called a 'flexural failure.'

A polyurethane soft materials are normally attached with a rolled copper foil or electroplated copper for use in a PCB construction. This type of material is often the base material used in a flexible PCB.
There are many other terms for flexible PCBs which can be found here

fcb_fab_flexible_related_title: Other Users Are Also Getting a Quote to Related Products
fcb_fab_flexible_related_rigid_word: These PCBs integrate flexible PCBs and rigid PCBs. Because connectors are not required for connection between layers, they are ideal for digital devices that are vulnerable to noise effect.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_tick_word: Thick-copper PCBs are used to transfer a high amount of electrical current while maintaining low voltage drops and low temperatures for your system. This allows an engineer to design with a technology that does not generate a lot of heat.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_multilayer_word: Multilayer PCB saves the space and weight, and increases capacity through layering. It is important in modern manufacturing due to its versatility.
